lenders.name: Nilesh Dosooye
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: it is my chance to give back to the world.  Social injustices and destitution plague our world each and every day.  Through Kiva we are enabled to help overcome these plagues.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a Canisius High School graduate heading into Canisius College for the fall.  I will begin my studies in International Business and Spanish, thus providing credentials to leave the country someday to fight social injustices and economic instability. I have plans to go to Mexico my Freshman year  and am very excited.

Over the Spring I attended a life changing Immersion trip to the Republica Dominicana.  I was able to attended this trip through the efforts of Canisius High.  

On this trip we rebuilt a house for a man by the name of Fulvio.  Earlier in the year his house had burned due to a propane explosion.  Fulvio had a large family to feed and protect.  Help was in dire need.  Nine of my classmates and three teachers attended the trip to help rebuild what he had lost.  It was a success.  Along with the rebuilding of the house we also helped build the roof of a community center in a Haitian refugee camp named Acension

After we had finished, never in my life did I feel more content and proud of myself.  The feeling was exhilarating and life changing......... forever.  I hope to get that same kind of feeling through Kiva.

lenders.name: Larissa
lenders.loan_because: I can't afford to donate large amounts of money every month but I've always wanted to help out somehow. When a professor told me about Kiva, I knew this was something I could do to help someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a B2B franchisor doing public relations for our franchisees and corporate communications. Basically, whenever someone in the company needs something professionally written, they come to me.

lenders.name: Rotary Club of Union
lenders.loan_because: This is the international project of the Rotary Club of Union, NJ.  Our members are interested in what is taking place in the community, nation, and the world, and are motivated to make a difference in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: Rotary members have many opportunities for humanitarian service, both locally and internationally. Through Rotary, you can help make the world a better place. Service programs address concerns that include poverty, illiteracy, health care, hunger, community needs and more. Rotarians experience the fulfillment that comes from giving back to the community. Rotarians are welcomed at more than 31,200 Rotary clubs in over 160 countries, wearing a pin that is recognized throughout the world. Rotarians gain an understanding of humanitarian issues through international service projects and exchange programs. One of Rotary’s highest objectives is to build goodwill and peace throughout the world.

lenders.loan_because: Access to capital is vital to economic stability and prosperity.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with individuals and small business entities to help facilitate compliance with complex tax laws and regulations. This includes return preparation, financial analysis and tax research and consultation.

lenders.name: Amelie
lenders.loan_because: U.S. is an imperialist state and trying to act in solidarity with those who have lived with the repercussions of colonialism and imperialism is a mere start to creating a better world that I am fighting for

lenders.name: Ved, Vivek, Vandana
lenders.loan_because: helping someone become independent and enabling them to get access to better opportunities is our small way of reaching out to others

lenders.name: Joy
lenders.loan_because: I lived in Peru for a short time during the 1980's and the experiences I had there changed my life forever. I hope to impact someone else's life by paying if forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in reading and literacy. Education is important it empowers people to transform their lives.

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: Now that I have the resources to help others, it's important that I do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit company that advocates for non-public & independent schools

lenders.name: Traci
lenders.loan_because: I inherited some extra money when my father passed over and he would love the idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach university students about other cultures and especially ancient cultures that we can only understand through archaeology.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I care about others and want everyone to have opportunities to be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 2nd grade students.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: It's the best thing to do!
lenders.occupational_info: I fix and maintain electrical equipment in a waste water treatment plant, actually called a POO-POO Plant!!

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with the freedom to work/educate/and fulfil my dreams and those of my children. Everyone deserves the same chance.

lenders.name: Kellie
lenders.loan_because: It gives me a perspective of what a "Hard Day" really is; and how lucky I am. I want to help others I love how rewarding it feels.
lenders.occupational_info: Fulfilling! My kids are my life and I'm a hard working wife.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because:
It is a great way to help others and allow them to live the life they enjoy.
There is joy in accomplishment, and this provides them the means to enjoy the fruits of their own labor.
lenders.occupational_info: I consult, and prepare tax returns for corporations and high net worth individuals.

lenders.name: farnaz
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help disadvantaged people around the world. We all deserve a second chance
lenders.occupational_info: I work with websites, i help make them easy to use

lenders.name: DesignChick
lenders.loan_because: I feel it's necessary to connect with others across the globe and share some of the goodness I have in my life with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm new at this, so I can only start small and work into it over time.  I will do all I can when I can and I am really looking forward to helping someone achieve their dream, as I get to live mine (career wise) every day.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others better themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I run an Information Technology department at a university.  I provide computer and network support to staff and students.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: What do we live for, if it is not to make life less difficult for each other? George Eliot

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.occupational_info: Principal of a little school in Canada where the families are hard working, ordinary folks and the staff are too.

lenders.name: Ibnie
lenders.loan_because: im a malaysian people who need to start my own business, with my business that i start, i need to bring all people can have a business too with me . Help people to change their life, and trust the technology can bring the business in easy way. sometimes i think we can share around global. i need friend to partner with me.
lenders.occupational_info: want  to start my business with people.

lenders.name: Kerstin
lenders.loan_because: It is wonderful to share energy !
lenders.occupational_info: Trying to integrate the old knowledge of universal laws and female values into modern life

lenders.name: Gianluca
lenders.loan_because: to help giving a chance

lenders.name: Damilola
lenders.occupational_info: I am into IT for development. I devvelop website for educational organizations and I provide IT services for some organizations here in Nigeria

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.occupational_info: detailed oriented, at times mind-numbing, and filled with insane requirements, deadlines and crazy people

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: this is the best way to help people help themselves without feeling you are being taken advantage of. Like they say, every little bit helps!
lenders.occupational_info:
I translate technical and general texts from German into English. My operating instructions are easy to understand! 
:)

lenders.name: Corinna
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea that a group of people can help allover the world with a very low expense.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a secretary in an elementary school.

lenders.name: angelika
lenders.loan_because: I got some help for my business, now I will give some.

lenders.name: Brittany
lenders.loan_because: Kiva offers me a chance to put my money to good use by letting it benefit other instead of wasting it on things  I don't need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a university student studying Journalism. I will later study library science in graduate school.

lenders.name: Jenn
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a worthwhile project. I've had the opportunity to travel and I know how a little bit of help can really be important to many people in the world. We can all help one another. For less than the price of a tank of gas, you can lend a helping hand!
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my two children full time and I am a photographer part time.

lenders.name: Tomás
lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneurs should help each other, no matter the place.
lenders.occupational_info: I do stuff like this very Kiva website.

lenders.name: MEg
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with families to help them succeed; and I work with troubled children so they can return to their families one day.

lenders.name: mike and belinda
lenders.loan_because: a few years ago Mikes parents lent us some money so we could start our own business which has been highly succesful. We want to help other people who want to have a crack at running their own show.
lenders.occupational_info: Really simple! Selling stuff (clothing and travel gear) in a shop. It ain't glamorous but it's fun and profitable.

lenders.name: Esther
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed with people who have supported me, now I want to give something back.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: helping other people changing their lives is priceless.
lenders.occupational_info: i help social enterprises plan and scale their reach.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: It's good to be able to help!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach classes in literature.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: It's a simple gesture with a great impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a local non-profit developing volunteer resources and administering various grants.

lenders.name: Robert Kahn
lenders.loan_because: I know it can help.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate and I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Inventor

lenders.name: Rusty
lenders.loan_because: I want to and I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a disabled physician living with my 16 yo son.  I would like to expand my interest in the development of microfinance opportunities, perhaps to the extent of a new career as I am still relatively young, just unable to practice surgery.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I'm not rich but I feel I'm blessed with more than enough and I'd like to help those who need it.

lenders.name: Terry & Judy
lenders.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is required

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: My daughter gave me a certificate for my birthday.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: it feels good to give even this small something back to the world and in some way help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer, working at a book distribution warehouse.

lenders.name: Salvador
lenders.loan_because:
My family and I immigrated to the US from Central America 27 years ago. I remember my mother telling me stories about a small store that she used to have in her home when we were young. The money she made from selling items out of her home, made it possible for her to put food on the table for her family. 

I lend because I am greatful for my mothers sacrifice. I am giving back to those that are making the sacrifice to lift their families up and out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with low income teenagers, that need guidence in their lives. I am also going to school to become a teacher.

lenders.name: João
lenders.loan_because: I believe in simple people

lenders.name: Aimee
lenders.loan_because: I can!  I have vast opportunities as a woman in a free country.  My international sisters aren't as lucky as I am.  I feel so proud to be able to make a positive difference in the lives of others.  My heart is full.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I am truly blessed and want to help my brothers & sisters in humanity.

lenders.name: Marion
lenders.occupation: Clown in a hospital for children

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: I  have travelled the world extensively ,both as a soldier and civilian. We are so lucky to have been born in such a prosperous part of the world and should try and balance the disparity with those who are not so lucky.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a Battlefield Guide and take schoolchildren to places where the British Army have fought. I explain to them the truth about war.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: it works.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I am able to
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of people at the end of their  lives who have AIDS

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: Life's given me a lot more than I need, so I'm spreading it around.
lenders.occupational_info: For now, I work at a big, fancy law firm.  It's not as exciting as you'd think.  Or maybe you think it's not exciting, in which case you'd be correct.

lenders.name: Rick Redline
lenders.loan_because: I believe that microfinance is the worlds best hope of alleviating poverty in this generation.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to children 6-12 years old.  This work lets me travel the world and understand it's people.

lenders.name: Xinwei
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference to this earth that i live in.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to help others and make this place a better place

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: Every person has the power to make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Salome
lenders.loan_because: there's never a wrong time to do the right thing.  And these people work hard and appreciate any help they get.

lenders.name: Adam and Becca
lenders.loan_because: ...well, because we can. It is our small way to help create a better world, and this world needs a lot of help!
lenders.occupational_info: Adam teaches cultural anthropology at Augustana College. Becca is a musician and runs a college bookstore.

lenders.name: Laura B.
lenders.loan_because: I admire initiative and the courage it takes to ask for help. I feel wonderful being able to help. It empowers me. It radiates a great sense of possibility.
lenders.occupational_info: I make portrait paintings with oils. I love making art.

lenders.name: Braxton
lenders.loan_because: I loaned because my Granddad gave me a certificate
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student at Maple Ridge

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: We all need to help others help themselves.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping the fisherman buy the rod.
lenders.occupational_info: I run educational leadership training programs for high school students.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to be without; without money, without resources, without hope.  I believe that helping those that are striving to help themselves is the best investment we can make in our collective future.

lenders.name: Carey
lenders.loan_because: It is a really nice thing to do.

lenders.name: Shiko
lenders.loan_because: We are a non-profit community drumming group based in Swansea, UK. We play songs and rhythms inspired by the music of Africa. The group unanimously decided to use a proportion of group funds to lend to people in developing countries, and in particular Africa, in gratitude for the gift of music that has been passed on to us.

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: It's difficult to get a small business started, and while I don't have the capital to be a financier in the US; with Kiva I can still make a difference to help other entrepreneurs improve their local economies the world over.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a small company that helps other businesses build, use, and otherwise take advantage of new and emerging technologies to improve their products and services as well as their outreach to customers.

lenders.name: Trevor Powell
lenders.loan_because: God has been good to me and made it possible for me to share with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at Yahoo! and help build the Internet.

lenders.name: Liblav
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find information. WE have programs, services, and collections at the library for people to enjoy and learn.

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: give to those who ask
lenders.occupational_info: My work is with my son ,we install flooring. I also have 13 grandchildren and enjoy every minute with them.

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because: I am little more then a placeholder in this world just trying to do the little that I can, Max and Sam will fix things.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with school kids that have learning and emotional needs.

lenders.name: Kay
lenders.loan_because: It is an effective way to made a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I manage an office and do the accounting
